Subscription.Description: Events indicating a security-enabled group was modified
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- User added to a security-enabled group --> <!-- Local users added to a local security-enabled group will only send the SID of that user to the event collector --> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (EventID=4728 or EventID=4732 or EventID=4756)]] </Select>
<!-- Modification of a security-enabled group --> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and EventID=4735]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
